Token.Abstract: Represents a resource property entity for convenient XML serialization process.
Returns an array of RKRequestDescriptor objects to be added to the manager for mapping objects of the class to request.

Parameter.Name: serverProfile
Parameter.Abstract: Server Profile for configuring mapping according to server version

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array of RKRequestDescriptor objects to be added to the manager.
